entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:04 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 03:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then becoming west 40 gusting to 70. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
